description: Family-owned organic farm specializing in fresh vegetables and sustainable farming practices. We have been serving the local community for over 20 years with the highest quality produce.
farmHistory: Founded in 2003 by the Johnson family, Green Valley Organic Farm started as a small 5-acre plot and has grown to a 50-acre certified organic operation. We focus on sustainable farming methods, crop rotation, and natural pest management to provide the freshest, healthiest produce to our community.

description: Premium dairy farm producing fresh milk, cheese, and yogurt from grass-fed cows. We pride ourselves on animal welfare and sustainable practices.
farmHistory: Established in 1995, Sunrise Meadows has been a family tradition for three generations. Our 200-acre farm is home to 150 Holstein cows that graze on organic pastures. We use traditional cheese-making methods passed down through generations.

description: Specializing in heirloom apple varieties and fresh apple products. Our orchard offers pick-your-own experiences and farm-to-table dining.
farmHistory: Since 1988, Mountain View has been growing over 50 varieties of apples using integrated pest management. Our 75-acre orchard includes heritage varieties like Northern Spy and Winesap, plus modern favorites like Honeycrisp.

description: Small-scale berry farm growing strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries. We offer seasonal u-pick and pre-picked berries.
farmHistory: Started in 2010 as a retirement project, Heritage Berry Farm has grown into a beloved local destination. Our 15-acre farm uses organic methods and focuses on soil health to produce the sweetest, most flavorful berries.

description: Traditional grain farm producing wheat, barley, oats, and specialty grains. We mill our own flour and offer fresh-baked goods at our farm store.
farmHistory: A fourth-generation family farm established in 1920. Our 500-acre operation focuses on sustainable grain production and soil conservation. We've recently added a stone mill to process our grains into fresh flour.

description: Year-round greenhouse operation specializing in tomatoes, peppers, herbs, and microgreens. We use advanced hydroponic systems for consistent quality.
farmHistory: Founded in 2015, Coastal Greenhouse Gardens combines traditional growing knowledge with modern technology. Our 10,000 sq ft greenhouse facility allows us to provide fresh produce year-round while using 90% less water than traditional farming.
